pages.text:
Contact Us
We like to call ourselves a “hidden gem”! You can find us at
1255 S. Dora Blvd. Tavares, Fl 32778.
Turn onto South Dora Blvd from 561 and go straight! The road dead ends at the gates of Far Reach Ranch. Come on through and keep going straight -
past the building
on your right hand side. You’ll see another pair of black iron gates -
that is the entrance to our blueberry fields and event space!
Continue down the gravel road and follow the signs (stay to the left at the fork). You’ll see our barn and wedding venue as you approach. Parking is in the field in front of the barn!
Strawberry Upick
is located on the right hand side of S. Dora Blvd, before you pass the building on your right hand side!
Far Reach Ranch
1255 S. Dora Blvd.
Tavares, FL 32778
Phone:
(352) 343-7389
Email:
hello@farreachranch.com
Office Hours:
Monday-Friday 9-5
UPICK Hours:
See our social media for hours and info.

Mamas & Mimosas
Sat, May 10, 2025
9:00 AM
Sun, May 11, 2025
4:00 PM
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us at Far Reach Ranch for Mamas and Mimosas on Mother’s Day weekend featuring our FAMOUS Mimosa bar, Upick blueberries, food, bar, live music, bounce houses and more!
Saturday: 9-4 and Sunday 10-4
$15 farm pass (per car) required:
GET TICKETS HERE
Last entrance to the UPICK fields is 3pm! Pre-picked berries available for purchase until 4pm.
View Event →

4:00 PM
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us at Far Reach Ranch for Easter weekend featuring, THE EASTER BUNNY, Upick blueberries, food, bar, live music, bounce houses and more!
Saturday: 9-4 and Sunday 10-4
FREE EVENT - NO PARKING OR ADMISSION FEE
Last entrance to the UPICK fields is 3pm! Pre-picked berries available for purchase until 4pm.
*We will not be hosting an Easter Egg Hunt this year!

Apr
2
to May 9
Very Berry Happy Hour
Wed, Apr 2, 2025
9:00 AM
Fri, May 9, 2025
4:00 PM
Far Reach Ranch
(map)
Google Calendar
ICS
Join us for a Very Berry Happy Hour and get
$1 off upick berries, beer and wine
Weds-Fri from 1-4pm!
Full bar is not open during the week... Limited bar (blueberry beer and wine) is available for Very Berry Happy Hour!
Upick Blueberry price: $6/lb
Pre-picked Blueberries: $7/lb
HOURS:
Wed-Sat 9am-4pm
Sunday 10am-4pm
*Last entrance into the upick fields is 3pm!!! Pre-picked berries available for purchase until 4pm.
We have pre-picked fruit, jams, honey, baked goods and merchandise available for purchase at our Upick.
View Event →

Join us at Far Reach Ranch every Sunday for VINYL BRUNCH with a live dj spinning vinyl records, Upick blueberries, food, bar, live vinyl DJ, bounce houses and more!
No admission or parking fee unless noted!
Easter Weekend - $15 entrance fee
Mother's Day Weekend - $15 entrance fee
